title: A small reminder from Support mains
body:
Please let us use our relic charges! Especially on those first two melee minions so we can get to level 2 as soon as possible.
Remember that only melee champions can use the execute, so it might not look like we are going for it but we are!
It makes laning much more difficult than it has to be when we have to struggle for every single relic charge.
Even in Plat this still happens :(
